post.description: Returns the block header for a given block hash.

method.description: The name of the method to be invoked.

params.description: The block hash for which the header should be retrieved.

id.description: A unique identifier for the request.

baseFeePerGas.description: The base fee per gas for the block.

efficiencyScore.description: The ratio of entropy reduced by the block to the entropy reduced by the uncles in this block. An estimate of how much work was wasted by the block.

etxEligibleSlices.description: A 256 bit hex encoded indicator of which other zones are eligible to recieve external transactions in this block. The value of each bit is 1 if the corresponding zone is eligible, 0 if not.

etxRollupRoot.description: Hash of all external transactions emitted since the previous coincident block.

etxSetRoot.description: The hash of all of the external transactions in the state trie.

evmRoot.description: The root hash of the EVM Ledger state trie.

exchangeRate.description: The exchange rate of Quai and Qi for this block.

expansionNumber.description: The number of dynamic shard expansions that have occurred since genesis.

extraData.description: Arbitrary hex-encoded extra data included in this block.

gasLimit.description: The maximum gas allowed in this block.

gasUsed.description: The total used gas by all transactions in this block.

interlinkRootHash.description: Hash of the block hashes of the most recent interlink blocks at each level of the hierarchy.

manifestHash.description: Hash of all of the blocks confirmed in subordinate chains to this block since the last coincident block.

number.description: Integer block numbers at each level of the hierarchy.

outboundEtxsRoot.description: Hash of all outbound external transactions emitted in this block.

parentDeltaEntropy.description: The change in entropy since the previous coincident block in each level of the hierarchy.

parentEntropy.description: Total entropy reduced since genesis prior to this block in each level of the hierarchy.

parentHash.description: The hash of the parent block for each level of the hierarchy.

parentUncledDeltaEntropy.description: The entropy reduction of uncles since the previous coincident block in all subordinate chains to this block for each level of the hierarchy.

primeTerminusHash.description: The hash of the most recent prime block the shard this block was included in.

qiToQuai.description: The conversion rate from Qi to Quai at this block.

quaiStateSize.description: The size of the Quai Ledger state at this block.

quaiToQi.description: The conversion rate from Quai to Qi at this block.

receiptsRoot.description: Receipt trie root hash of the block.

secondaryCoinbase.description: The secondary coinbase address of the miner of this block. Only transaction fees are paid to this address.

size.description: The size of the block header in bytes.

stateLimit.description: The total number of bytes of state allowed in this block.

stateUsed.description: The number of bytes used in the state trie within this block.

thresholdCount.description: The number of prime blocks since the uncle rate has crossed the rate threshold for dynamic expansion. Specification denoted by Quai Improvement Proposal 8.

transactionsRoot.description: The root of the transaction trie of the block.

uncleHash.description: The hash of the uncles data in the block.

uncledEntropy.description: The entropy reduced by all uncles included in this block.

utxoRoot.description: The root hash of the UTXO ledger state trie.

coinbase.description: The address of the account that mined this block.

difficulty.description: The difficulty achieved by this block.

headerHash.description: The hash of the work object header data.

location.description: The 4 byte zone location identifier of the block.

lock.description: The duration that the block rewards for this block are locked.

mixHash.description: The ProgPOW mix hash of this block.

nonce.description: The random number used in the valid proof-of-work.

parentHash.description: The hash of the parent block this block was mined on.

primaryCoinbase.description: The primary coinbase of the miner of this block. Determines whether block rewards are paid out in Quai or Qi.

primeTerminusNumber.description: The number of the most recent prime block the shard that this block was included in.

timestamp.description: Timestamp for when this block was collated.

txHash.description: The hash of one or more transactions worked and included in the block.

result.description: The block header data for the given hash.
